rows.label: qev025901_MSG0001
rows.name:
Er, hello? You're the human who helped Dr. Staccata
stop Fraisie, aren't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0002
rows.name:
Good. Good timing. I need your help, you see?
The doctor still hasn't come back from his undercover
investigation, and and I don't know what to do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev025901_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Jalimbo what the undercover investigation is about.

rows.label: qev025901_JNK0020
rows.name: Shrug

rows.label: qev025901_SEL0021
rows.name: Say the name Fraisie doesn't ring any bells.

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0003
rows.name:
That rotten Fraisie took what was left of her cult and
disappeared into Cauldros, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0004
rows.name: Wow. You're very very forgetful, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0005
rows.name:
She's the terrible person who poisoned the water at
Biahno Lake, then handed out a miracle cure in order
to recruit Ma-non into her her cult?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0006
rows.name:
Sounds familiar, no? Well, it turns out she took all her
remaining followers and disappeared in Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0007
rows.name:
The doctor was sure she'd try some new scam,
so so so he pretended to be a believer and snuck
into their hideout.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0008
rows.name:
But but but I haven't heard from him at ALL, okay?
I'm worried he's gotten caught or...you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0009
rows.name:
...Huh? Well, speak of the deviled-egg pizza—it's the
doctor, isn't it?! Will you wait just a second, please...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hello hello? Yes yes, this is Jalimbo.
Where are you, Doctor?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0011
rows.name:
I'm in the Bandits' Refuge in in in Cauldros.
You must get in touch with [ST:playername ].
Tell [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ] I need help, and [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] has to hurry, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0012
rows.name:
...Uh-oh. Fraisie's coming back, it seems.
Please, Jalimbo. I don't have long before—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0013
rows.name: ...I lost the connection.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0014
rows.name:
This is very very very bad news, although at least you
were around when it happened, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0015
rows.name:
Please, you have to go rescue the doctor, okay?
And then maybe stop Fraisie from whatever she's
trying to do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0016
rows.name:
Dr. Staccata is headstrong and impulsive,
but he has a true heart, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0017
rows.name: So hurry to Cauldros, yes? Yes! And thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0022
rows.name:
Whatever Fraisie's cooked up this time,
it it it can't be good, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0023
rows.name:
So please head to Bandits' Refuge in Cauldros and
save Dr. Staccata, won't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0024
rows.name:
Dr. Staccata's back safe, yes? And I hear Fraisie's also
been captured? This is a good news parade![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0025
rows.name: Please let me give you this as thanks, if I may?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0026
rows.name:
Still, um...I guess all of of of the Ma-non that Fraisie
took with her were killed, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0027
rows.name:
If you and Dr. Staccata hadn't saved me, I'd probably
have been there with them, wouldn't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0028
rows.name:
So I've decided to spend my life keeping the doc safe.
He's so impulsive, and I think that's probably the best
way to repay him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev025901_SEL0031
rows.name: Leave Dr. Staccata in Jalimbo's care.

rows.label: qev025901_JNK0040
rows.name: Warn

rows.label: qev025901_SEL0041
rows.name:
Tell Jalimbo to be wary of xenoforms
masquerading as humans.

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0029
rows.name:
Leave it to me! Oh, but if you could teach me how
to fight sometime, that might actually be...good?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025901_MSG0030
rows.name:
That sounds like real trouble, doesn't it? I'll be sure to
keep the the the doctor away from anyone who's even
a little bit suspicious.[ST:wait ]
